message: A Danish guy I work with, who works in Afghanistan, is looking for a tech guy who can work for some time in Afghanistan with a bank. They have a horrible IT setup and needs it to be restructured. I will give you direct contact details if you are interested :) (and yeah Afhganistan is pretty crazy place to go, but maybe somebody here is adventurous ;) )
Money, actual skills, etc you will need to talk with this guy about. He told me that the money should be pretty good.
Of course english speaking skills is needed
You should put this on Noticias Hacker Too Dan: http://www.noticiashacker.com/noticia/ag5ub3RpY2lhc2hhY2tlcnIMCxIEUG9zdBj1-AQM
Is this with a private company or with the US DoD?
Is a private company, a national bank
How do I find this Danish guy?
